scripts.build: pnpm run --filter workerd-vite-utils --filter preact-workerd-ssr-plugin --filter solid-workerd-ssr-plugin --filter preact-app --filter solid-app --sequential build
scripts.build:watch: pnpm run --filter workerd-vite-utils --filter preact-workerd-ssr-plugin --filter solid-workerd-ssr-plugin --parallel build:watch
